content: > this sweet little cozy pattern is **free forever** > as a thank you please leave a > friendly hello in the comments and let > me know your favorite part of this > design > love these cables you can purchase > the entire **snow fern > collection** 1 10 patterns in one > bundle for only $30 > if you d like to help support these > free patterns please consider buying > me a coffee on ko-fi 2 any amount means the > world to me you can also show your > support by sharing this pattern with > your fiber friends thank you so much **design** worked in the round with worsted weight yarn this cozy will keep your hands safe from a piping hot cup of tea or coffee simple cables slowly taper outwards and inwards creating fern-like shapes a longtail tubular cast on is utilized allowing this cozy to fit a wider range of cup sizes written in one size see finished measurements below all repeats appear in bold text throughout pattern pattern is charted and also includes separate written instructions **yarn** worsted weight yarn pictured in malabrigo merino worsted 3 in pale khaki **yardage** approx 40 yards/37 m **needles** bottom ribbing us 5/3 5 mm dpn s or go 1 size down from the needle size you make gauge with cozy & top ribbing us 6/4 mm dpn s **notions** 1 stitch marker for bor 2 additional stitch markers for marking pattern repeats if desired cable needle if desired tapestry needle blocking materials **gauge** cable pattern worked in the round with larger needle steam blocked 1- chart repeat 18 sts & 17 row = 2 5 / 6 cm wide x 2 5 /6 cm tall **finished measurements steam blocked and lying flat ** *fits a 12-ounce 20-ounce and 24-ounce cup * top circumference 8 /20 cm bottom circumference 6 5 /20 cm height 5 / 16 5 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/the-snow-fern-collection 2 https //ko-fi com/kalurah 3 https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/malabrigo-yarn-worsted
